feed.title: Prakhar Sharma
feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: GitHub Student Developer Pack: Namecheap crazy permissions

link.title: GitHub Student Developer Pack: Namecheap crazy permissions

entry.summary: As a part of GitHub Student Developer Pack, NameCheap provides a free domain for 1 year. I thought why not try it out. When I started to access the free domain, it literally asked full access to my Github account. It is like selling your kidneys to buy an iPhone.

entry.title: How to install Alacritty on X11 without building from source

link.title: How to install Alacritty on X11 without building from source

entry.summary: So I want to install a terminal emulator called Alacritty on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS. Their github release page is mostly showing wayland based versions. I found two options. I am also avoiding building from source. Is the PPA trustable?

entry.title: 50Mb Windows 7.

entry.title: Lenovo SK 8821 hotkeys not working after upgrade from 20.04 to 22.04

link.title: Lenovo SK 8821 hotkeys not working after upgrade from 20.04 to 22.04

entry.summary: Yesterday, I upgraded from Ubuntu 20.04 to 22.04LTS on my desktop PC. It automatically updated all the packages. Today I noticed that the hotkeys of my Lenovo SK 8821 is not working. These hotkeys functioned perfectly for the last two years without any need for manual configuration. The keyboard is using “Lite-On Technology Corp. Lenovo … Continue reading Lenovo SK 8821 hotkeys not working after upgrade from 20.04 to 22.04

entry.title: Are conventional Indian universities competing at global level at all?

link.title: Are conventional Indian universities competing at global level at all?

entry.summary: If you see the NIRF’s India University 2023 ranking, you will see IISc on the top followed by JNU, JMI, AMU etc. Although I don’t consider IISc as a university because they only offer courses in science, thus, not a convectional university. But if you go to international ranks, for example, QS ranking, these universities do … Continue reading Are conventional Indian universities competing at global level at all?
